BiblioData.Title: Memory device
BiblioData.Abstract: Memory device, comprising a storage material, a first electrode connected to the storage material; and a second electrode associated to the storage material.

Claims.P: 1. Memory device, comprising:
- a storage material (7),
- a first electrode (3) connected to the storage material; and
- a second electrode (13, 17) associated to the storage material.
2. Memory device of claim 1, characterized in that it comprises a probe (17) that is movable across the storage material and that forms the second electrode.
3. Memory device of claim 1, characterized in that the second electrode (13) is fixed to the storage material (7).

4. Memory device of one of the preceding claims, characterized in that it comprises at least one of an interface layer (5) arranged between the first electrode and the storage material (7) and an interface layer (9) arranged on top of the storage material.

5. Memory device of one of the preceding claims, characterized in that it comprises a means (19) adjusted to apply a voltage pulse to the storage material to store and erase information in the storage material.

6. Memory device of one of the preceding claims, characterized in that it comprises a means (19) to read information stored in the storage material which is adapted to apply and measure an electric current flowing through the storage material or adapted to measure an electric field of said storage material.

7. Memory device one of the preceding claims, characterized in that the storage material (7) is one of the group comprising a material exhibiting a change of conductivity upon application of an electric current, a material exhibiting a change of conductivity upon application of an electric field, a material exhibiting a change of polarization upon application of an electrical current, and a material exhibiting a change of polarization upon application of an electric field.
